heading: Read file names
title: Read all file names in a directory
summary: A quick utility to read all file names in a directory using Node.js.

body.raw:
Required: `node.js` installation.

Quickly get all files' names inside a folder

```bash
console.log(fs.readdirSync('./folder-path'))
```

Example:

```bash showLineNumbers
# Make sure node.js installed
node -v
v22.9.0

# Now it's good to go
node
> console.log(fs.readdirSync('./folder'))
[
  '.DS_Store',
  'authors',
  'blog',
  'headerNavLinks.js',
  'logo.svg',
  'projectsData.js',
  'SITE_METADATA.js',
  'snippets'
]
```
